results.name: a(n) = lcm(A260443(n), A260443(1+n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..4096
Index entries for sequences related to lcm's
mathematica: a[p_?PrimeQ] := a[p] = Prime[ PrimePi[p] + 1]; a[1] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = Times @@ ( a[First[#]] ^ Last[#] & ) /@ FactorInteger[n]; (* after _Jean-François Alcover_, in A003961 *) A[n_]:= If[n<2, n + 1, If[EvenQ[n], a[A[n/2]], A[(n - 1)/2] A[(n + 1)/2]]] ;Table[A[n], {n, 0, 51}] (* sequence A260443 *) Table[LCM[A[n], A[n + 1]], {n, 0, 101}] (* _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 22 2017 *)
program: A003961(n) = my(f = factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); \\ From _Michel Marcus_
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 22 2017
